title: Litro halts LP gas distribution for 5 days
body_lines: Litro Gas Lanka Ltd. has decided to keep its storage terminal in Kerawalapitiya closed for a period of five days in view of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.
Thereby, the storage terminal will temporarily halt operations from 13-17 April.
This will also bring the island-wide distribution process will also come to a temporary standstill during the aforementioned period.
